mapper.select: select tkmx.DQRQ from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b,TY_REPAY_TKMX tkmx ,TY_REPAY_LSZ lsz,TY_REPAY_YEHZ yehz,ty_customer_base c,TY_KDK_JH jh where b.ty_customer_id = c.id and c.KHNM = tkmx.khh and lsz.JJH=tkmx.JJH and yehz.JJH = tkmx.JJH

with mibusidata as ( SELECT * FROM (
select distinct tkmx.YWBH , b.id as id , b.KHH, b.KHMC, b.ZJHM, rygl.SSBM, b.SJ, b.SXED, b.GHJL, tkmx.JKRQ as LOANDATE, tkmx.DQRQ, tkmx.DKQX, tkmx.JZLL, tkmx.FFJE as REQLMT, jh.ts as DELAYINTERESTDAYS, jh.ts as DELAYAMTDAYS, jh.qs as qs, rq.a+jh.ts as DLAYDT, yehz.SHBJ, yehz.JKJE, yehz.KSQXRQ, yehz.SHLX, yehz.DKYE, yehz.BNQX, yehz.BWQX, yehz.DKYE as BALAMT , yehz.dkye as yxye , sysuser.display_name from (select basic.card_id as cardid, max(to_number(jh.qs)) as qs from (select trunc(to_date(rq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) a from ty_kdk_jh) rq, TY_REPAY_TKMX tkmx, TY_CUSTOMER_BASE b, ty_customer_rygl rygl, TY_REPAY_YEHZ yehz, ty_kdk_jh jh, basic_customer_information basic, sys_user sysuser where 1=1 and b.khnm=tkmx.khh and b.khjl=rygl.dm and yehz.JJH = tkmx.JJH and substr(jh.ywbh,1,length(jh.ywbh)-2)=tkmx.ywbh and b.id=basic.ty_customer_id and basic.user_id=sysuser.id and rq.a=to_date(jh.rq,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and sysuser.id =#{userId}
group by basic.card_id) maxqs, (select trunc(to_date(rq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) a from ty_kdk_jh) rq, TY_REPAY_TKMX tkmx, TY_CUSTOMER_BASE b, ty_customer_rygl rygl, TY_REPAY_YEHZ yehz, ty_kdk_jh jh, basic_customer_information basic, sys_user sysuser where 1=1 and b.khnm=tkmx.khh and b.khjl=rygl.dm and yehz.JJH = tkmx.JJH and substr(jh.ywbh,1,length(jh.ywbh)-2)=tkmx.ywbh and b.id=basic.ty_customer_id and basic.user_id=sysuser.id and rq.a=to_date(jh.rq,'yyyy-mm-dd') and jh.qs=maxqs.qs and basic.card_id=maxqs.cardid ))
select ( select count(distinct(a.id)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as increaseLoancount , ( select count(distinct(a.id)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as loanCustomerSum ,
(select count(distinct(b.id)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where b.ty_customer_id=a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as increaseCusSum ,
(select count(distinct(b.id)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where b.ty_customer_id=a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as centreLoansSun ,
(select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as increseOverdueCusTheMon ,
(select count(distinct(a.id)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id
and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as alloverdue ,
(select sum(a.balamt)/(trunc(to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))-trunc(to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information c where c.ty_customer_id = a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and c.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as increaseBalanceTheMonth ,
(select sum(a.yxye) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information c where c.ty_customer_id = a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and c.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as loanBalanceSum ,
(select sum(a.yxye) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information c where c.ty_customer_id = a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and c.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as contBalace ,
( select sum(a.REQLMT) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where b.ty_customer_id= a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as increaseLoanCredit ,
( select sum(a.REQLMT) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where b.ty_customer_id= a.id and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as contAmt , (select sum(nvl(a.DKYE,0) + nvl(a.BNQX,0) + nvl(a.BWQX,0)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information c where a.id = c.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and c.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueBalanceTheMon ,
(select sum(nvl(a.DKYE,0) + nvl(a.BNQX,0) + nvl(a.BWQX,0)) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information c where a.id = c.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and c.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueBalance ,
(select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id
and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) < 30 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) < 30 and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM0 ,
( select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 30 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 30 and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM1 ,
(select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 60 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 60 and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM2 ,
( select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 90 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 90 and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM3 ,
(select count(distinct a.id) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 120 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 120 and a.DLAYDT <= to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.DLAYDT >= to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM4 ,
( select sum(a.SHLX) from mibusidata a, basic_customer_information b where a.id = b.ty_customer_id and a.LOANDATE <= #{endDate} and a.LOANDATE >= #{startDate}
and b.USER_ID =#{userId} ) as resvIntAccum
from dual
